00017 XMLMessage::XMLMessage(const Message& MesgFromPeer)
00018 {
00019     doc         = XMLTreeParser::ParseMessage(MesgFromPeer.GetLength(), (unsigned char*)MesgFromPeer.GetBuffer());;
00020     origine = MesgFromPeer.GetOrigine();
00021     pid         = MesgFromPeer.GetPeerId();
00022     mid         = MesgFromPeer.GetMsgId();

00025 XMLMessage::~XMLMessage()
00026 {
00027     if ( doc != NULL )
00028     {
00029         xmlFreeDoc(doc);
00030         doc = NULL;
00031     }
00032 }

00034 XMLMessage::XMLMessage(const XMLMessage& msg)
00035 {
00036     if ( msg.doc )
00037     {
00038         doc = xmlCopyDoc(msg.doc, 1 ); // 1 stands for recursive copy
00039     }
00040     else
00041     {
00042         doc = NULL;
00043     }
00044     origine = msg.origine;
00045     pid = msg.pid;
00046     mid = msg.mid;
00047 }

00049 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::GetRootNode()
00050 {
00051     if(doc) return xmlDocGetRootElement(doc);
00052     else return NULL;

00055 void XMLMessage::Display(FILE* fout)

00060 xmlAttrPtr XMLMessage::FindAttribute(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00061 {
00062     if(node)
00063     {
00064         xmlAttrPtr current = node->properties;
00065         while(current)
00066         {
00067             if( name == (const char*)current->name )
00068             {
00069                 return current;
00070             }
00071             current = current->next;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     return NULL;
00075 }
00076
00077 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::FindFirstChild(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00078 {
00079     if(node)
00080     {
00081         xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00082         while(current)
00083         {
00084             if( (current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) && (name == (const char*)current->name) )
00085             {
00086                 return current;
00087             }
00088             current = current->next;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     return NULL;
00092 }
00093
00094 void XMLMessage::DisplayNode(xmlNodePtr node, FILE* fout)
00095 {
00096     if(node)
00097     {
00098         xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00099         if(current)
00100         {
00101             fprintf(fout, "<%s>\n", node->name);
00102             while(current)
00103             {
00104                 if((current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE))
00105                     DisplayNode(current, fout);
00106                 current = current->next;
00107             }
00108             fprintf(fout, "</%s>\n", node->name);
00109         }
00110         else fprintf(fout, "<%s/>\n", node->name);
00111     }
00112 }
00113
00114 SimpleString XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(xmlNodePtr node)
00115 {
00116     SimpleString str;
00117     bool cdata = false;
00118
00119     xmlNodePtr cur = node;
00120
00121     for(; cur && !cdata; cur = cur->next)
00122     {
00123         if(cur->type == XML_TEXT_NODE)
00124         {
00125             str += (const char*)cur->content;
00126         }
00127         else if(cur->type == XML_CDATA_SECTION_NODE)
00128         {
00129             str = (const char*)cur->content;
00130             cdata = false;
00131         }
00132     }
00133     return str;
00134 }

00161 void XMLTreeParser::Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& cd)
00162 {
00163     XMLMessage * msg = new OMISCID_TLM XMLMessage(cd.Msg);
00164     if ( msg && msg->doc != NULL )
00165     {
00166         PushMessage(msg);
00167     }
00168     else
00169     {
00170         if ( msg != NULL )
00171         {
00172             delete msg;
00173         }
00174     }
00175 }
00176
00177 void XMLTreeParser::PushMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00178 {
00179     listXMLMsg.Lock();
00180     listXMLMsg.Add(msg);
00181     event.Signal();
00182     event.Reset();
00183     listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00184 }
00185
00186 int XMLTreeParser::ProcessMessages()
00187 {
00188     listXMLMsg.Lock();
00189     int nb = 0;
00190     XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00191     while( listXMLMsg.IsNotEmpty() )
00192     {
00193         msg = listXMLMsg.ExtractFirst();
00194         try
00195         {
00196             ProcessAMessage(msg);
00197         }
00198         catch( SimpleException &e )
00199         {
00200             OmiscidTrace( "'%s' occurs when processing XML message : %s (%d)\n", e.GetExceptionType().GetStr(), e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00201         }
00202         delete msg;
00203         // listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00204         nb++;
00205     }
00206     listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00207     return nb;
00208 }

00210
00211 void XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00212 {
00213     OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage\n");
00214     msg->Display();
00215 }
00216
00217 XMLMessage* XMLTreeParser::GetMessage()
00218 {
00219     XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00220     listXMLMsg.Lock();
00221     if(listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements())
00222     {
00223         listXMLMsg.First();
00224         msg = listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00225         listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00226     }
00227     listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00228     return msg;
00229 }
00230
00231 void XMLTreeParser::ClearMessages()
00232 {
00233     listXMLMsg.Lock();
00234     for(listXMLMsg.First(); listXMLMsg.NotAtEnd(); listXMLMsg.Next())
00235     {
00236         delete listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00237         listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00238     }
00239     listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00240 }
00241
00242 unsigned int XMLTreeParser::GetNbMessages()
00243 {
00244     listXMLMsg.Lock();
00245     int nb = listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements();
00246     listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00247     return nb;
00248 }
00249
00250 bool XMLTreeParser::WaitForMessage(unsigned long timer)
00251 {
00252     event.Reset();
00253     if(!HasMessages())
00254     {
00255         return event.Wait(timer);
00256     }
00257     return true;
00258 }

00260
00261 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE XMLTreeParser::Run()
00262 {
00263     while(!StopPending())
00264     {
00265         try
00266         {
00267             if(WaitForMessage(10))
00268             {
00269                 ProcessMessages();
00270             }
00271         }
00272         catch(SimpleException& e)
00273         {
00274             OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::Run: ExceptionRaisedFromDown (%s)\n", e.msg.GetStr() );
00275         }
00276     }
00277
00278     // OmiscidTrace( "ThreadWasAskedToDie\n" );
00279 }
00280
00281 bool XMLTreeParser::HasMessages()
00282 {
00283     return GetNbMessages() != 0;
00284 }
